column6: It's the knock-out drag-out you've all been waiting for! Spider-Man versus Mysterio!!  Who will team up with Spidey to save the day?  And will they get there in time??  Another rockin' chapter of the all new ULTIMATE COMICS SPIDER-MAN, from the hotshot team-up of BRIAN MICHAEL BENDIS and DAVID LAFUENTE .   Rated T  ...$3.99
column8: | writer:Brian Michael Bendis | penciller:David Lafuente | letterer:Cory Petit | colorist:Justin Ponsor
